in MATLAB met P1,P2,P3 van V90:
[Dax,Mbeta,Mr,P,Cdax,Cp,a]=bem(10,2,0.5,2,1.4,P1,P2,P3)
Dax 	=	-2.9594e+05
Mbeta 	= 	-3.1690e+06
Mr 	=	3.5375e+05
P 	= 	7.0750e+05
Cdax 	=  	-0.7443
Cp 	=  	0.1779
a 	=  	-0.1604


bem(10,2,0.5,2,1.4,V90())
(-295936.24800095666, -3168982.1677219472, 353751.03844115598, 707502.07688231196, -0.7442918196056697, 0.17793967847285272, -0.1603582019642209)
